name: Schultz Creek
directions: Start in Flagstaff and head out on Highway 180 to the Schultz pass turnoff about 3 miles out and take a right on the turn off. head about a half mile and the trail head starts where the road forks.<br /><br /><br /><br />I'm not from there and have only been once, but once your there go to Buffalo Park and head off in to the trail system. There is a ton of trails, so go to any of the<br />10 bike shops and get them to hook you up with a trail map and point where and <br />how you get to Shultz Creek.
description:
Great trail, once you get there. I bit off just a bit too much for my self . 25 miles to be exact. It's a network of trails to get there but once you do the actual Shultz
trail is about 6-8 miles of smooth downhill, with great views of the mountains.
